metadata.name: DiffuGen
metadata.description: Advanced image generation tool powered by Stable Diffusion. Works in Windsurf/Cursor/Roo Code/Etc.. Supports multiple models including Flux Schnell, Flux Dev, SDXL, SD1.5  and SD3. Generate high-quality images with precise control over parameters like dimensions, steps, CFG scale, seed, and negative prompts.
metadata.author: cloudwerxlab
metadata.usage: Generate an image by typing: 'generate an image of [description]' with optional parameters like model, dimensions, steps, cfg, and seed. Example: 'generate an image of a cat in space using flux-dev, 1024x768, 30 steps, cfg 7, seed 42'. SD Models can also use negative prompts.
